availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hannah Catherine "Kate" Estes Riddle (Scott County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of William Estes and Mary Estes. Married to James W. Riddle in Scott County on October 4, 1859. Mother of Mary L. Riddle, William M. Riddle, and Sarah A. Riddle. Student in Scott County in 1850. Resident of Scott County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 469B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Peaks Mill, Enumeration District 074, p. 246D.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, 1803-1883, Film #000183225, p. 99 of 331 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "Kate Estes Riddle (1839-1935)," Memorial 43446394, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43446394 (accessed July 6, 2020).
